Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the <RED>Snow Festival</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's start off by making some snow
sculptures. I will put <MYNAME> in
charge of leading the project.
<PAGE>
Don't worry. As long as everyone works
together, you'll be able to make a big
snow statue in no time! Let's get to it!

You made a <BLUE>snowman</BLUE>!
This seems too small for something
everyone worked on...

You made an <BLUE>animal snow sculpture</BLUE>!
This seems kind of small for a joint
effort...

You made a <BLUE>Pegasus and knight snow
sculpture</BLUE>! It's quite good. Well done!

You made a <BLUE>castle snow sculpture</BLUE>!
It's quite a masterpiece! You really did
it!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The ice sculpture is complete! Good
work, everyone.
<PAGE>
I've prepared some stew for us to enjoy
while we take in the ice sculpture.
Come and grab a bowl!

I should go have some stew with
<CHARANAME0>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No matter how old I get, I will never
grow tired of playing in the snow. I
feel like a kid again.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, we should take a photo later
later to commemorate this. I'm sure your
parents would love to see it.
<PAGE>
So many things have happened since you
came to this town. You have my
gratitude.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, do you like stew?
<PAGE>
Camellia's stew is simply the best.
You should come and try it some time.
You're always welcome in our home.
<PAGE>
Don't worry. We're friends, aren't we?
No need to be shy. We'll be expecting
you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you must be cold from making
that snow sculpture. You should take it
easy in the bath later.
<PAGE>
If you'd like, I can give you some of my
favorite bath salts. They'll warm you
up splendidly.
<PAGE>
We need to make sure you stay happy and
healthy. We can't have you getting sick.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it was so very fun making
that snow sculpture with everyone,
wasn't it?
<PAGE>
I never experienced anything like it in
my previous town. Everything in this
town really warms the heart.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, your help in building the town
is so very wonderful. I'm so glad I
moved here.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, your leadership in making the
snow sculpture was good. You're may be
young, but you make a fine leader.
<PAGE>
One of these days, you will be the
mainstay of the entire town. I can't
wait to see it when it comes.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, if you ever need anything,
I'll help you without a second thought.
You can always count on me.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's fun making snow sculptures, isn't
it? We should have made an igloo. I bet
it'd be fun to sleep in one!
<PAGE>
Speaking of sleeping, <MYNAME>, you
should come over to my inn sometimes.
Your stay will be on the house!
<PAGE>
You're always so busy, so I want you to
be able to relax at my inn if you get
the chance.
